data.name: Confirm
data.value: You are about to submit a post to ${0} blog(s).\nIf this post has been submitted before, this will resubmit the post.

data.name: err_NoBlogSelected
data.value: Please select at least one blog to which your post will be submitted.

data.name: err_NoCityNHoodSelected
data.value: Please select at least one city and/or neighbourhood.

data.name: err_PostPermission
data.value: You cannot create a new blog post.

data.name: err_TagExists
data.value: Tag already exists, please enter different one.

data.name: LegalAgreement
data.value:
BLOG DISCLAIMER

This blog is provided by Century 21 Canada Limited Partnership (Century 21) as a convenience to our associates and our clients.
Terms and Conditions of Use

This site is not moderated by Century 21. You use this site at your own risk. Century 21 assumes no responsibility for the contents of or the accuracy of any posting on this site. If you do not agree with the foregoing, then you are prohibited from using this site. You agree that “use” or “using” includes but is not limited to reading, posting, copying forwarding, deleting, modifying or in any other way contributing to or utilizing this blog.
If you utilize this blog in any way, you will only do so in accordance with the following terms and conditions:

(a) Century 21 Canada Limited Partnership (Century 21) is not responsible for the contents of any posting on this blog, except where the posting purports to be and actually is posted by Century 21. Except where the post is actually posted by Century 21, any opinions or alleged facts contained in any blog are opinions and facts being asserted by the author of the post and are not opinions or facts being belonging to Century 21.
(b) This site is not moderated and accordingly, except as set out in paragraph (a) above, Century 21 has no responsibility for the contents of this blog.
(c) Century 21 makes no representations as to accuracy, completeness, currentness, suitability, or validity of any information on this site and will not be liable for any errors, omissions, or delays in this information or any losses, injuries, or damages arising from its display or use. All information is provided on an as-is basis.
(d) You will not post materials on this site that are not your property, which you do not have express permission to use for this purpose or which are not in the public domain.
(e) You will not publish statements on this blog which may be defamatory.
(f) You will not make comments on this blog which hold or may hold individuals up to ridicule or contempt or which discriminate against individuals because of their race, colour, ancestry, place of origin, religion, marital status, family status, physical or mental disability, sex, sexual orientation or age.
(g) You will not publish threats or statements which may be perceived to be threatening to Century 21, its employees, affiliates or any other person.
(h) Where you make statements containing personal information about a third party, in doing so you represent that you have the consent of that third party to disclose their personal information.
(i) You will not use this blog to provide goods or services, except goods or services expressly sanctioned and endorsed by Century 21.
(j) You will not publish information relating to illegal activities or to gambling.
(k) You will not use language which is profane, obscene, obnoxious, insulting, or derogatory to third parties.
(l) If you follow a link to a third party website which appears on this blog, you do so at your own risk. Century 21 takes no responsibility for the contents of any third party website or for any damage caused by that third party site.(l) You will notify Century 21 immediately if you discover information posted on this blog which violates these terms and conditions of use, which you consider to be an unauthorized use of your property or which otherwise you consider is or may be unlawful.
(m) You agree that your use of this blog and the interpretation of these terms and conditions of use shall be interpreted in accordance with the laws of the Province of British Columbia, Canada and you attorn to the courts of the Province of British Columbia, Canada in the event that any dispute arises with regard to your use of this blog.
(m) Facts and opinions expressed on this blog are the facts or opinions of the author and not those of Century 21, unless the fact or opinion is expressly stated to be the fact or opinion of Century 21 and which actually is a fact and opinion asserted by Century 21. Where facts or opinions expressed are those of Century 21, we may be mistaken. You agree to independently verify any fact set out by Century 21 or a third party before you rely on any facts or opinions set out in this blog in any way.
(o) Century 21 may remove any content which, in its sole discretion, it considers to be contrary to these terms and conditions of use, or to be offensive or unlawful or which it, in its sole discretion, considers inappropriate for inclusion on this blog
(p) You will notify legal@century21.ca if you find information on this site which is unlawful, proprietary, defamatory or contrary to these terms and conditions of use. While Century 21 will endeavour to remove post on this blog which are contrary to the terms and conditions of use, Century 21 does not warrant to do so and, except as set out herein, takes no responsibility whatsoever for the content of this blog.

Century 21 grants you non-exclusive, non-transferrable, limited license to access, use and display the blog and the materials herein, provided that you comply fully with these terms and conditions of use.

You grant Century 21 a non-exclusive, non-transferrable, limited license to post your comments on this blog, subject to these terms and conditions of use.

data.name: PostingSaved
data.value: Blog posting has been successfully saved.

data.name: PublishDeleteLink
data.value: To publish or delete this blog post, click here.

data.name: AutoSaveError
data.value: An error occurred while attempting to automatically save your post. Please try manually saving your post by clicking Save above.

data.name: EmailBloggingInstructions1
data.value: E-mail Blogging is a quick and easy way to write your blog posts on the go. It’s as simple as writing an E-mail message and sending it to a special address.

data.name: EmailBloggingInstructions2
data.value: Enter the body of the post into the body of the E-mail and the title of the post into the subject line. Send the E-mail to: blogs@century21.ca from your @century21.ca E-mail address - your blog post will be automatically created and posted to your website. Any attached images will be automatically added to your post.

data.name: EmailBloggingInstructions3
data.value: In order to protect your identity and ensure that only you can post to your blog, you will need to start the subject of your email with a PIN. We’ve automatically selected one for you, but you can change it at any time. To change your E-mail blog PIN, enter it and click Save.

data.name: EmailBloggingValidationError
data.value: The E-mail Blogging PIN is invalid (Must be a number between 0001 and 9999)

data.name: TagDeleteConfirm
data.value: Are you sure you want to delete this tag? This will remove this tag from every blog post using the tag. This action cannot be undone.

data.name: TagManagerInstructions
data.value: Warning. Changing or deleting any of your existing tags, listed below, will alter the tag in every blog post where it has been used previously.

data.name: TaggerHelpText
data.value: Enter a category for this post. If the category doesn't already exist, click "add" to create it.

data.name: CommentSaved
data.value: The comment has been successfully saved.
